pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========``regress``===========|PyPI| |Pythons| |CI|.. |PyPI| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/regress.svg :alt: PyPI version :target: https://pypi.org/project/regress/.. |Pythons| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/regress.svg :alt: Supported Python versions :target: https://pypi.org/project/regress/.. |CI| image:: https://github.com/Julian/regress/workflows/CI/badge.svg :alt: Build status :target: https://github.com/Julian/regress/actions?query=workflow%3ACIPython bindings to the Rust `regress <https://docs.rs/regress/latest/regress/>`_ crate, exposing ECMA regular expressions... code:: python >>> from regress import Regex >>> regex = Regex(r"\d{4}") >>> regex.find("2020-20-05") is not None True
